name: The Best Thai Tom Kha Soup Recipe
author: natty's pantry
summary: Tom Kha Gai - Thai chicken coconut soup aromatic of lemongrass, lime kaffir leaves and galangal, gives you a refreshing aftertaste with a creamy taste from coconut.
ingredients: 1 stalk lemongrass, tough outer parts removed, thinly sliced
2 pounds boneless chicken thighs, cut against the grain into bite-sized pieces
directions: Bring coconut milk and chicken stock to a boil in a pot over high heat
Add cilantro, lemongrass, galangal, Thai chile peppers, and kaffir lime leaves; simmer for 5 minutes
Add chicken; simmer until no longer pink in the center, about 7 minutes
Stir in cabbage; cook until wilted, about 3 minutes
Remove soup from heat; stir in lime juice and fish sauce
